fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring

Class DateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring.DateManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class DateManager
extends android.app.DialogFragment
    A simple class who generate an instance of DatePickerDialog and provide static methods to handle relationships between dates

      static void setTextViewFormattedDate(java.util.Date date, android.widget.TextView textView)
      This method set the text of a TextView based on a selected date the text will be a relative date (Today, Yesterday, Tomorrow) or will follow this format : thursday, june 21 2018

    • Field Detail

      • dateSetListener

        private android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener dateSetListener
        Listener for the DatePickerDialog created on the onCreateDialog method. When the user set a date, this listener will call the OnDateManagerResult method from the all the Fragment who use this components.

      • setTextViewFormattedDate

        public static void setTextViewFormattedDate(java.util.Date date,
                                            android.widget.TextView textView)
        This method set the text of a TextView based on a selected date the text will be a relative date (Today, Yesterday, Tomorrow) or will follow this format : thursday, june 21 2018

        textView - the TextView you want to set the text
